SEARCH
Package org.opencastproject.metadata.dublincore

Interface CatalogUIAdapter

All Known Subinterfaces:
EventCatalogUIAdapter, SeriesCatalogUIAdapter
All Known Implementing Classes:
CommonEventCatalogUIAdapter, CommonSeriesCatalogUIAdapter, ConfigurableDCCatalogUIAdapter, ConfigurableEventDCCatalogUIAdapter, ConfigurableSeriesDCCatalogUIAdapter
public interface CatalogUIAdapter
A CatalogUIAdapter converts between a concrete MetadataCatalog implementation and a DublinCoreMetadataCollection that

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    ORGANIZATION_WILDCARD
    Wildcard to specify tenant-agnostic catalog UI adaptors.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    MediaPackageElementFlavor
    getFlavor()
    Returns the media type of catalogs managed by this catalog UI adapter.
    String
    getOrganization()
    Returns the name of the organization (tenant) this catalog UI adapter belongs to or "*" if this is a tenant-agnostic adapter.

  • Field Details

    • ORGANIZATION_WILDCARD

      static final String ORGANIZATION_WILDCARD
      Wildcard to specify tenant-agnostic catalog UI adaptors.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • getOrganization

      String getOrganization()
      Returns the name of the organization (tenant) this catalog UI adapter belongs to or "*" if this is a tenant-agnostic adapter.
      Returns:
      The organization name or "*"

    • handlesOrganization

      boolean handlesOrganization(String organization)
      Check if the catalog UI adapter belongs to a tenant.
      Returns:
      true if adapter belongs to tenant.

    • getFlavor

      MediaPackageElementFlavor getFlavor()
      Returns the media type of catalogs managed by this catalog UI adapter.
      Returns:
      The media type of the catalog

    • getUITitle

      String getUITitle()
      Returns:
      Get the human readable title for this catalog ui adapter for various languages.

    • getRawFields

      DublinCoreMetadataCollection getRawFields()
      Returns all fields of this catalog in a raw data format. This is a good starting point to create a new instance of this catalog.
      Returns:
      The fields with raw data

    • getRawFields

      DublinCoreMetadataCollection getRawFields(Map<String,ResourceListQuery> collectionQueryOverrides)
      Returns all fields of this catalog in a raw data format. Allows to hand over custom queries to fill the collection of a metadata field (defined by its output id) from a list provider.
      Parameters:
      collectionQueryOverrides - A map of custom list provider queries mapped to metadata fields by the output id. Can be empty.
      Returns:
      The fields with raw data

    • getRawFields

      DublinCoreMetadataCollection getRawFields(ResourceListQuery collectionQueryOverride)
      Returns all fields of this catalog in a raw data format. Allows to hand over custom queries to fill the collection of a metadata field (defined by its output id) from a list provider.
      Parameters:
      collectionQueryOverride - A custom list provider query mapped to every metadata field.
      Returns:
      The fields with raw data
